synopsis: Meet Wang Xiaomao, a middle-aged man trapped in his adolescent fantasies, but surprisingly possessing incredible superpowers. He also has a dominant childhood friend named Ye Yihan, who happens to be a tyrannical CEO. However, a sudden betrayal by his once trusted friend ignites a determination within Wang Xiaomao to transform into the ultimate antagonist boss. Prepare for epic battles, complex relationships, and a rollercoaster of emotions in this captivating series!
